description:
doc/install: mention GOPATH and point to code.html

Fixes issue 3469.

messages.text:
LGTM

Fix indent in description.

I would drop the word "extensive", which is a matter of opinion.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM

Are there any other links that should go under What's Next?  Maybe a link to the codewalks, talks, or something?

On 7 June 2012 09:39,  <kevlar@google.com> wrote:
> LGTM
>
> Are there any other links that should go under What's Next?  Maybe a
> link to the codewalks, talks, or something?

I think "For the full story, consult Go's extensive documentation."
just about covers it.

Andrew

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c1fea9469295 ***

doc/install: mention GOPATH and point to code.html

Fixes issue 3469.

R=golang-dev, kevlar, rsc, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6304049

http://codereview.appspot.com/6304049/diff/1/doc/install-source.html File doc/install-source.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/6304049/diff/1/doc/install-source.html#newcode224 doc/install-source.html:224: Learn how to build and test Go code and set up a work environment (GOPATH) put these in the other order. you set up your environment before you build and test. plus you can't follow a document. The document <>How...<> explains how to set up a work environment in which to build and test Go code. http://codereview.appspot.com/6304049/diff/1/doc/install.html File doc/install.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/6304049/diff/1/doc/install.html#newcode233 doc/install.html:233: Learn how to build and test Go code and set up a work environment (GOPATH) ditto

PTAL http://codereview.appspot.com/6304049/diff/1/doc/install-source.html File doc/install-source.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/6304049/diff/1/doc/install-source.html#newcode224 doc/install-source.html:224: Learn how to build and test Go code and set up a work environment (GOPATH) On 2012/06/08 03:15:19, r wrote: > put these in the other order. you set up your environment before you build and > test. plus you can't follow a document. > > The document <>How...<> explains how to set up a work environment in which to > build and test Go code. Done. http://codereview.appspot.com/6304049/diff/1/doc/install.html File doc/install.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/6304049/diff/1/doc/install.html#newcode233 doc/install.html:233: Learn how to build and test Go code and set up a work environment (GOPATH) On 2012/06/08 03:15:19, r wrote: > ditto Done.

subject: code review 6304049:       doc/install: mention GOPATH and point to code.html
